title: How to Open Mouth Kiss - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 06.21.18
description:
Thanks to Hims for sponsoring this episode. Get a trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/morningshow.

Thanks to MeUndies for sponsoring this episode. Get 20% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/morning

Andy and Nick talk about instituting an open mouth kiss policy in the office, the Baldwin brothers, the Waynes brothers, Chad Michael Murray, and the new TMNT movie.

-New teenage mutant ninja turtles movie is in development (43:20 mins)
-X-Men might still join MCU (46:30 mins)
-Moviepass will introduce surge pricing next month (51:25 mins)

Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
